## MakeReadonly type

Makes specified keys of an interface readonly.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MakeReadonly<GType extends {}, GKeys extends Key<GType>> = Omit<GType, GKeys> & {
    +readonly [P in GKeys]: GType[P];
};
```
